Do not throw pearls before swine.

Kasta inte ut barnet med badvattnet.
Do not throw the baby out with the bathwater.
Every man loves well what is like to him: Do not reject something in its entirety just because parts of it are bad; other parts might be good.

Klaga inte över för lite vind - lär dig segla.
Don’t complain about lack of wind—learn to sail.
A beloved child has many names.
Every man loves well what is like to him: Someone or something which is popular is often referred to by many different epithets.

Let the buyer have a thousand eyes for the seller wants only one.
